title: Breakingviews TV: Pet ceremony
text:
Breakingviews TV: Pet ceremony 10:48pm IST - 02:49
Antony Currie and Rob Cyran explain how animal-health company Zoetis is hoping the growing trend of people treating their dogs, cats, snakes and gerbils more like humans will help it get decent returns from an expensive $2 bln deal for Abraxis. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Antony Currie and Rob Cyran explain how animal-health company Zoetis is hoping the growing trend of people treating their dogs, cats, snakes and gerbils more like humans will help it get decent returns from an expensive $2 bln deal for Abraxis.
